list.abs: Why did not you tell me earlier , you blockhead !, 你干嘛不早告诉我 , 你这木头脑瓜!
He could never speak quite patiently to the old blockhead ., 他实在无法很耐心地对这个老笨蛋说话.
He could never speak quite patiently to the old blockhead ., 他实在无法很耐心地对这个老笨蛋说话.
Though I have been always a blockhead , I have not been always a rascal., 尽管我从来都是个傻瓜 , 但我并非一直是个恶棍.
Sure , he might really be a blockhead !, 确定 , 他可能真是的一个傻瓜!

auth_sentence.content: He doesn't exactly fit into your blockheaded idea of vegetarians, now does he?
auth_sentence.res_content: He doesn't exactly fit into your blockheaded idea of vegetarians, now does he?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He doesn't exactly fit into your blockheaded idea of vegetarians, now does he?

baesInfo.translate_result: blockaded实行封锁( blockade的过去式 )
